theJob.message: You have been served in English. Nothing to see, please move on.

sendEmailWarningFlag.title: Email was sent
sendEmailWarningFlag.mainBody: The email was sent successfully, but we encountered some problems in processing it afterwards:
sendEmailWarningFlag.sharingFailed: Email could not be shared and will not be visible in the "Related emails" section.
sendEmailWarningFlag.issueUpdateFailed: Issue was not updated. When searching for issues with related emails via JQL this issue might not be found.
sendEmailWarningFlag.triggerFailed: "Email was sent" automation triggers were not fired for this issue.

renderingTemplateErrorFlag.title: Rendering template failed
renderingTemplateErrorFlag.mainBody: The template could not be applied. Its content is probably configured incorrectly. Please contact your administrator or the template's creator to fix it.

templateSingle.renderErrorMessage: The template contains a syntax error and could not be rendered. Please check the template and try again.
